item.title: No Jekyll
item.description: I had a bit of a headscratcher yesterday, as I was writing the Concepts post and found that my slickly autogenerated architecture diagrams were missing from my posts. Navigating to the image source URLs was giving me the big fat 404 on GitHub pages: For sanity, I checked out the deploy branch, gh-pages, and sure enough my diagrams were present, nestled in a folder called _gen. I was immediately suspecious about the leading underscore, and a quick search of “github pages underscore” reminded me that GitHub processes deployments with Jekyll unless instructed not to.
